text: Hi Eugenio! Nice to meet you. I'm a Lead Lighting and Lookdev artist at Framestore. I have been here for many years ( 13 I think?) and prior to that I worked in commercials and films in various companies in London fpr about 9 years. I also taught Maya at the NFTS and helped animation direction students with their projects when they wanted to use 3D packages. My partner went to NFTS too many years ago! Which department are you in ?

Hi really pleased to get in contact with you!! I am in DFX department I am actually finishing my first year! After our first two projects (take one painting and Motion Capture) I realized I want to specialize in lighting even if I love 3D modeling!
let me know if you have any questions, I will try and help as best as possible
